Past Events

  • Self Advocacy with Cindy Goldrich

    February 26, 2015 Metuchen High School Auditorium

    Cindy Goldrich, certified ADHD coach will speak about the need for self-advocacy, communication, the law, and the need for your child to understand his or her strengths and weaknesses.
